mapper.select: select a.rent_id, a.num_electric as num, a.date as time,c.house_name,a.state from cost as a, rent as b, house as c where DATE_FORMAT(a.date , '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y%m') and a.num_electric != '' and b.rent_id = a.rent_id and b.house_id = c.house_id

select a.rent_id, a.num_water as num, a.date as time,c.house_name,a.state from cost as a, rent as b, house as c where DATE_FORMAT(a.date , '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y%m') and a.num_water != '' and b.rent_id = a.rent_id and b.house_id = c.house_id
mapper.insert: insert into cost (rent_id, date, state) values (#{rentId}, current_time, 0)
mapper.select: select a.rent_id from rent as a where a.state = 1 and a.rent_id not in (select b.rent_id from cost as b where DATE_FORMAT(b.date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m'))
mapper.update: update cost set num_electric = #{num}, upload_electric = current_timestamp where rent_id = #{rentId}
update cost set num_water = #{num}, upload_water = current_timestamp where rent_id = #{rentId}
update cost set num_electric = #{numElectric}, upload_electric = current_timestamp where cost_id = #{costId}
update cost set num_water = #{numWater}, upload_water = current_timestamp where cost_id = #{costId}
update cost set cost_water = #{costWater}, cost_electric = #{costElectric}, mis = #{mis}, total = #{total}, state = #{state} where cost_id = #{costId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cost where DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = #{time} and (ISNULL(num_water) or ISNULL(num_electric))

select a.cost_id, a.rent_id, a.date, a.num_water, a.cost_water, a.num_electric, a.cost_electric, a.mis, a.total, a.upload_electric, a.upload_water, a.state, c.house_name from cost as a, rent as b, house as c where a.rent_id = b.rent_id and b.house_id = c.house_id and DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = #{time}

select a.cost_id, a.rent_id, a.date, a.num_water, a.cost_water, a.num_electric, a.cost_electric, a.mis, a.total, a.upload_electric, a.upload_water, a.state, c.house_name from cost as a, rent as b, house as c where a.rent_id = b.rent_id and b.house_id = c.house_id and a.cost_id = #{costId}
select a.num_water, a.num_electric, DATE_FORMAT(a.date, "%m") as date from cost as a, rent as b where a.rent_id = b.rent_id and b.user_id = #{userId} and YEAR (a.date) = YEAR (NOW())
